attributes.action: ensure that current laws around anti social behaviour are enforced.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are currently laws around under age drinking, drunk and disorderly behaviour, threatening behaviour and the likes. Instead of adding to the tax burden the Prime Minister should ensure that our streets are safer by ensuring that offenders are arrested and charged and that premesis which sell to under age drinkers have their licences revoked immediately.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
